item.title: This Might Be the Most Massive Black Hole Ever Discovered
item.description: New measurements of the galaxy at the heart of the “Cosmic Horseshoe” indicate that it could house the most massive object ever seen in the universe.

item.title: ChatGPT’s model picker is back, and it’s complicated
item.description: GPT-5 was supposed to get rid of all the complicated AI models to choose from in ChatGPT, but that's not how it's panned out.

item.title: Sam Altman, OpenAI will reportedly back a startup that takes on Musk’s Neuralink
item.description: Neuralink has been making serious progress. Soon Sam Altman and OpenAI could be backing a challenger.

item.title: AOL Will Shut Down Dial-Up Internet Access in September
item.description: The move will pinch users in rural or remote areas not yet served by broadband infrastructure or satellite internet. Around 175,000 households still u...

item.title: StubHub is once again working on its IPO that could raise $1B
item.description: On Monday, StubHub filed an updated S-1. This indicates its delayed IPO is back on.
